name: Stretchy Slime
description:
Stretchy Slime is a game developed by Genís Bayó (Programming and Design) and Maryori Mayorga (Art). Sound effects and music are from Freesound, OpenGameArt and Incompetech.

Artist's Instagram: @ravencraft__

Controls:

Use the arrow keys or WASD to stretch. When you grow too long, you will spring and jump!

The game has a single, short level due to time restrictions. Enjoy!
